composition.translation[0].definitions[0: the way in which something is made up of different parts, things, or members

composition.translation[0].definitions[1: a piece of music, a poem, or a piece of writing

composition.translation[0].definitions[2: the art or process of writing pieces of music, poems etc

composition.translation[0].definitions[3: the way in which the different parts that make up a photograph or picture are arranged

composition.translation[0].definitions[4: a short piece of writing about a particular subject, that is done at school

composition.translation[0].definitions[5: the process of arranging words, pictures etc on a page before they are printed
